description: Pepper spray is used against crowds in Warsaw after Thursday's controversial court ruling.
title: Poland abortion ruling: Police use pepper spray against protesters
title_page: Poland abortion ruling: Police use pepper spray against protesters - BBC News
maintext: In Warsaw, hundreds of people marched from the court to the home of Jaroslaw Kaczynski - who heads the governing Law and Justice party - to vent their anger at the ruling. Some held candles or carried signs with the word "torture" on them.
